name: WinDev Window File
summary: Learn about .WDW files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: A WinDev project (.WDP file) may include multiple WDW files for different views and user forms within the application. WDW files are used for desktop applications whereas .WPW window files are used for mobile applications.

description: Developer file created by WinDev, a program used for making Windows and mobile applications; saves an application window and may include text fields, buttons, dropdown menus, graphics, and other elements; acts as a dialog box for user input or as a view for output display.
